statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences;
SELECT preferences FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(purchase_history,'{"product":"shoes"}', '$.items');
SELECT customer_id, preferences FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history) > 5;
SELECT customer_id, JSON_EXTRACT(purchase_history, '$.items[0].price') AS item_price FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(purchase_history,'{"product":"shirt"}', '$.items');
SELECT * FROM CustomerPurchasesAndPreferences WHERE preferences->'category' = 'clothing' AND preferences->'color' = 'blue';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT address, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price*quantity) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name, customer_id DESC
SELECT c.customer_id, c.name, p.date, p.product_id, p.quantity, p.price FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.quantity > 10 ORDER BY p.date DESC
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM Purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT preference_id, category, preference_value FROM Preferences WHERE category = 'food' ORDER BY preference_value ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM Purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, category, preference_value FROM Customers c JOIN Preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_score FROM preferences ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE length(recommendation_text) > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, address FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT preference_id, category, preference_score FROM preferences WHERE preference_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_level FROM Preferences ORDER BY preference_level DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, relevance_score FROM Recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 4.0;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM Purchases WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT name, email, age FROM Customers WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE in_stock = TRUE LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, product_name, recommendation_date FROM Recommendations WHERE relevance_score > 4.5
